meanings: [명사] hospitalization, [동사] enter[go into] a hospital, be hospitalized

vlive.korean: 입원했어? 왜? Are you hospitalized? Why? 듣기 View video TWICE : [AutoCut_SANA] TWICE First Half Highlight
강아지 입원하셨다고요? Your puppy is in the hospital? 듣기 View video NCT : 용이합시다 ~~ (녹색하트 녹색하트)
vlive.english: Your puppy is in the hospital?

vlive.korean: 잘 마무리했으면 좋겠습니다 - 입원 해야 돼요? Hope everything is okay. - Do you have to be hospitalized? 듣기 View video GOT7 : [ #GOT7NOW ] 뽐퉤겸나잇💚
vlive.english: Hope everything is okay. - Do you have to be hospitalized?

vlive.korean: 17살인데 허리디스크로 입원을 할 정도면 허리를 뭐 어떻게 썼길래 그래? You're 17 years old but was hospitalized for a herniated disc? What did you do? 듣기 View video Apink : 강남은 늘막힌다
vlive.english: You're 17 years old but was hospitalized for a herniated disc? What did you do?

vlive.korean: 독감 걸려서 입원했어? 어떡해... You are hospitalized with a flu? Oh no... 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 오랜만에승희다_!
vlive.english: You are hospitalized with a flu? Oh no...

examples.korean: Ten prison officers and three inmates needed hospital treatment following the riot. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 폭동이 있은 후 열 명의 교도관들과 세 명의 재소자들이 입원 치료를 받아야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
